note.p: German physicist. DPhil, Berlin, 1847; habilitated in physics, 1848. Privat-dozent, Bonn, 1849; professor extraordinarius, Marburg, 1849; professor, 1852. Professor of physics, Halle, 1853–95. Member of the Prussian assembly upper house from 1873. Member of the Naturforschende Gesellschaft zu Halle (Natural Science Society of Halle); committee member, 1879.
